biotools.summary: clean_reads cleans NGS (Sanger, 454, Illumina and solid) reads.It can trim bad quality regions, adaptors, vectors and regular expressions and also filters out reads that do not meet a minimum quality criteria.

bioschemas.name: Clean reads
bioschemas.summary: clean_reads cleans NGS (Sanger, 454, Illumina and solid) reads.It can trim bad quality regions, adaptors, vectors and regular expressions and also filters out reads that do not meet a minimum quality criteria.
